channel.title: Attacking Npcs
channel.description:
Ok i have a question about my server.
In my server, the npc's attack you when you attack them, and they keep attacking you.
I don't like this, and is there a way to change it so the npc's do not attack you constantly, and only the first hit you hit them.
please leave a comment explaining how and i will b thankful
thanx :)

item.title: Attacking Npcs
item.dc:creator: @RaZoR36 RaZoR36
item.description:
@RaZoR36 wrote:

Well one way i avoid it is running out of the room then clicking the npc from out of the room and my dude runs in and attacks, i dont get attacked then, if that doesnt work try re-teleporting and clicking attack from outside a room. thats the only cure i know x]

Read full topic

item.title: Attacking Npcs
item.dc:creator: @sigurd_03 sigurd 03
item.description:
@sigurd_03 wrote:

i got almost same prob i just that i i want my npcs to attack me
and i cant hit them

Read full topic
